post.body: haterz face our collective wrath.
- I'll be naming it Jawn Amdru. Miller.
You're so binary! I give you a 10.0
You should cook for me every day. Let's go get His & Hers oil changes now.
that's a good way to get smacked.
we should got to Iceland and BUY IT!
What do you suppose the chances are that my truck will start on Saturday?
Juan and I just spent an hour talking about how awesome you are. He should be cuddling you hard right now.
California Uber Alles, no question. Double-guaranteed secured by the alternate version "We've got a bigger problem now" too.
Let's hang in '09.
How can Gales and McQ and I have so much fun (cider)? G'night England. CYA tomorrow? Good. Blue Cheer rules.
Still a rage. In Manchester. Do the math. Not that crazy. Miss Jess more than anything ever.
Will arrive home at 11:45pm on Dec 19. Will head straight to LTP for buffalo wings. Will see you there.
Manchester. Beautiful weather. About to go try to get lost.
Getting horribly lost on foot in Oxford, England: 7.0
http://twitpic.com/r624 - Dear Oxford, U R WEIRD xoxo, DUSTY
Goodbye, Brooklyn. England- LOOK OUT!
Dear NYC, why aren't you cheaper? To keep hillbillies like me from moving in? That's whack.
French Meadow's mojito at the airport: 10.0
M
I want to skateboard so bad right now. Maybe I'll relearn to play guitar instead.
Bills: paid. I love having a "real" job.
jeez, i think my FAMILY wants to marry Jess. I am in charge of meal planning through the weekend. LOOKOUT, MOM!
SF, CA = High Octane Rageahol. Respect the Hustle indeed.
Airport Rage. This isn't so bad. Thank God for over the counter codeine from England. And my dentist.
Should be home in four hours. Don't want to jinx it. Just want to cuddle with girl and cats. Please?
Flight delayed. No wings. This is wack.
Feeling much more positive today. Kisses, buds, beers. Tonight. Or else I'm walking home.
Crushing defeat. No kisses, buds, or buffalo wings tonight. EAT IT, Newark. Time to see how smooth my travel agent is.
Oh I am dumb. But Friday y'all will be kissing me, right?
Tomorrow: kisses, buds, buffalo wings.
First time the sun has broken through the clouds during my two weeks in England being on my afternoon off in Camden: 10.0
Here I am: http://tinyurl.com/9e6jjd What does this gibberish mean?
I made a delicious breakfast with little to work with. The yam is a magical thing. @knucklesthedog - I'll drive to the co-op. Need eggs.
This breakfast factory is off the hook.
In bed with the lady showing her how to download apps on her NEW iPhone! Merry Christmas, honey. Best year ever.
What's for lunch? Jessie? Knuckles?Johnny? All three?
Whoah. Giant scone and enormous Americano. Time to write some songs.
Van filled with gas. Truck freed from snowbank. Girlfriend dropped off at work. I deserve a donut.
Intense deep cleanse of my room and closet. All bad memories and ill-fitting clothes will be out of my home and life by New Year's Eve.
I challenge anyone to listen to the song "Anthem" by Zebrahead and to then name a worse song.
Leo is my antidrug.
Guinness. Guitar Heroine. Girlfriend! Going to bed.
Oh man I would kill for some red beans and rice.
Oh man I totally love Taco Bell. And the roads back to SoDak have been clear and easy so far. And I have a car-crush on my little truck.
Kisses, buds, beers: achieved. This dream coming true: 10.0
Home, finally. Get to move the car in an hour and a half to avoid the plow.
